resources.string:
Thank you for using Chart Your Likes! I hope you liked it! :) 

This has been developed as part of Plynk's interview process. 

The libraries I used were:

 - Facebook Android SDK
 - MPAndroidChart
 - SweetAlertDialog


- Cal Martin 23rd May 2017
We\'ve fetched your favourite movies, and we\'ve compiled the charts below!
Here you can see a Pie Chart of the studios that have released your favourite films!
Here are all the films you\'ve liked, plotted by release year! Can you spot your favourite year?
